title: Gamification-Based Flipped Learning for Enhancing Pharmacy Library Information Utilization Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic information retrieval skills and understanding of fundamental pharmaceutical terminology
context.additional_context: Structured program for pre-service/in-service teachers to systematically acquire literature search, evaluation, and application skills required for pharmaceutical research and practice.

learning_goals: Learners can search for core pharmaceutical literature in academic databases (PubMed, EMBASE, etc.) with 90% accuracy
Learners can judge the reliability of academic materials with 85% accuracy by applying criteria for evaluating information source credibility
Learners can establish literature utilization strategies tailored to actual pharmaceutical scenarios through gamification activities based on teamwork
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
